document.full_text: the m.l.s. team lost to saprissa of costa rica, 2-1, but moved into the final on aggregate, 3-2.
document.title: saprissa 2, real salt lake 1 (real wins 3-2 aggregate): real salt lake advances to concacaf champions league final
lines_and_colors: the m.l.s. team lost to saprissa of costa rica, 2-1, but moved into the final on aggregate, 3-2.
